name: Animal Drifter
description:
Animal Drifter

Hurry up! Your kids are hungry and you have to find food before times run out.

Try to slide when you turn to get drift points, but don't be cocky because if you hit the wall too hard, you will either lose your drift points or even died. You can use your skill to help you complete the level.

FEATURES

● Free to play

● One finger control

● Compare your best score with others

● Skill system

● Avoid various obstacles

● Collect coins and unlock new animals.

● Unlimited levels

● Easy to play

● Playable offline or without internet

Feedbacks and Suggestions

Let me know in the comment section below if you have any feedback or suggestions that can help improve this game or anything.

You can also join our Discord server at https://discord.gg/5wkD4ja7rH, you can ask anything.
